description: Timeout improvement should target config, not code
sprintResults:
## Sprint 8 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Notes |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #70 | Add batch processor | 3 | ❌ Failed | #71 | Session timeout at 90m |
| #72 | Fix queue handler | 2 | ✅ Done | #73 | Completed in 15m |
| #74 | Add retry logic | 2 | ✅ Done | #75 | Completed in 12m |
| #76 | Update error handler | 1 | ✅ Done | #77 | Completed in 8m |
| #78 | Add dead letter queue | 2 | ✅ Done | #79 | Completed in 14m |
| #80 | Fix throttle config | 1 | ✅ Done | #81 | Completed in 6m |

**Velocity**: 8/11 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 30m (session limit)
**Issue**: Session timeout of 90m too short for 3+ point issues
**Current Config**: `acp.sessionTimeout: 5400000` (90 minutes)
**Recommendation**: Increase to `acp.sessionTimeout: 10800000` (180 minutes)

description: Code review prompt too strict — should target agent prompt
sprintResults:
## Sprint 12 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Review Result |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #110 | Add caching layer | 3 | ❌ Failed | #111 | Rejected: 'not enough inline comments' |
| #112 | Fix cache invalidation | 2 | ❌ Failed | #113 | Rejected: 'variable names not descriptive enough' |
| #114 | Add LRU eviction | 2 | ✅ Done | #115 | Approved |
| #116 | Fix TTL handling | 1 | ❌ Failed | #117 | Rejected: 'missing JSDoc on private function' |
| #118 | Add cache metrics | 2 | ✅ Done | #119 | Approved |
| #120 | Update cache config | 1 | ✅ Done | #121 | Approved |

**Velocity**: 5/11 points completed
**Duration**: 2h 00m (estimated 1h 10m)
**Root Cause**: Code review agent prompt requires excessive documentation
**False Rejections**: 3 PRs rejected for style, not substance
**Target**: Update code review agent prompt to focus on correctness over style

description: Missing lint rule — should add skill/QG check
sprintResults:
## Sprint 14 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Post-Merge Issue |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #130 | Add async handler | 3 | ✅ Done | #131 | Missing await — runtime error |
| #132 | Add event listener | 2 | ✅ Done | #133 | Missing await — silent failure |
| #134 | Add stream processor | 2 | ✅ Done | #135 | Missing await — data loss |
| #136 | Fix callback converter | 2 | ✅ Done | #137 | OK |
| #138 | Add promise wrapper | 1 | ✅ Done | #139 | OK |
| #140 | Update async utils | 1 | ✅ Done | #141 | OK |

**Velocity**: 11/11 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 15m (estimated 1h 15m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no floating promise check)
**Post-Merge Bugs**: 3 issues had missing `await` keywords
**Root Cause**: ESLint rule `@typescript-eslint/no-floating-promises` not enabled
**Target**: Add lint rule to quality gate configuration

description: Sprint planning process selecting wrong issues — process change needed
sprintResults:
## Sprint 16 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Priority | Should Be In Sprint? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #150 | Update button color | 1 | ✅ Done | #151 | P3 | No |
| #152 | Fix font size | 1 | ✅ Done | #153 | P3 | No |
| #154 | Add icon pack | 1 | ✅ Done | #155 | P3 | No |
| #156 | Fix critical auth bypass | 5 | Not planned | — | P0 | YES |
| #158 | Fix data corruption | 3 | Not planned | — | P0 | YES |
| #160 | Update hover effect | 1 | ✅ Done | #161 | P3 | No |
| #162 | Fix tooltip | 1 | ✅ Done | #163 | P3 | No |
| #164 | Add animation | 1 | ✅ Done | #165 | P3 | No |

**Velocity**: 6/6 points completed
**Duration**: 35m (estimated 40m)
**Critical Issue**: Sprint selected P3 cosmetic issues while P0 security issues sat in backlog
**Root Cause**: Sprint planning sorts by ICE score, not priority
**Target**: Change sprint planning process to prioritize by severity first
**Impact**: P0 auth bypass remained unpatched for another sprint

description: Quality gate timeout should be config change
sprintResults:
## Sprint 10 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | QG Duration | QG Timeout |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #90 | Add E2E test suite | 3 | ❌ Failed | #91 | 195s | 180s timeout |
| #92 | Add integration tests | 3 | ❌ Failed | #93 | 188s | 180s timeout |
| #94 | Add unit tests | 2 | ✅ Done | #95 | 45s | — |
| #96 | Fix test helpers | 1 | ✅ Done | #97 | 30s | — |
| #98 | Add test fixtures | 2 | ✅ Done | #99 | 55s | — |
| #100 | Update mocks | 1 | ✅ Done | #101 | 25s | — |

**Velocity**: 6/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 45m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Root Cause**: Quality gate timeout is 180s but E2E/integration tests take ~190s
**Current Config**: `qualityGate.timeout: 180000` (3 minutes)
**Needed**: `qualityGate.timeout: 300000` (5 minutes)
**Tests are passing** — they just take longer than the timeout allows

description: Agent generating wrong test framework — prompt update needed
sprintResults:
## Sprint 18 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Test Framework Used |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #170 | Add user service tests | 2 | ❌ Failed | #171 | Jest (project uses Vitest) |
| #172 | Add auth service tests | 2 | ❌ Failed | #173 | Jest (project uses Vitest) |
| #174 | Add order tests | 2 | ❌ Failed | #175 | Mocha (project uses Vitest) |
| #176 | Fix existing tests | 1 | ✅ Done | #177 | Vitest (correct) |
| #178 | Add test helpers | 1 | ✅ Done | #179 | Vitest (correct) |
| #180 | Update test config | 1 | ✅ Done | #181 | — |

**Velocity**: 3/9 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 50m (estimated 1h 00m)
**Root Cause**: Agent prompt doesn't specify test framework
**Pattern**: When writing new test files, agent defaults to Jest/Mocha
**Fix**: When editing existing test files, it uses Vitest (correct)
**Target**: Update code-worker agent prompt to specify 'use Vitest for all tests'

description: Max retry count too low — should be config change
sprintResults:
## Sprint 6 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | QG Retries | Final Attempt |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #50 | Add auth module | 3 | ❌ Failed | #51 | 3/3 | Almost passed — 1 test flaky |
| #52 | Add login page | 2 | ❌ Failed | #53 | 3/3 | Almost passed — lint trailing comma |
| #54 | Fix session | 2 | ✅ Done | #55 | 2/3 | Passed on 2nd try |
| #56 | Add logout | 1 | ✅ Done | #57 | 1/3 | Passed first try |
| #58 | Fix redirect | 1 | ✅ Done | #59 | 1/3 | Passed first try |
| #60 | Update docs | 1 | ✅ Done | #61 | 1/3 | Passed first try |

**Velocity**: 5/10 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 35m (estimated 1h 10m)
**Root Cause**: Max retries set to 3, but issues were converging — 4th attempt would likely pass
**Current Config**: `qualityGate.maxRetries: 3`
**Recommendation**: Increase to `qualityGate.maxRetries: 5`
**Evidence**: Both failed issues showed progress on each retry

**Quality Gate**: All passed (lint rules don't cover all conventions)
**Convention Violations**: 5/6 PRs violated project coding conventions
**Root Cause**: Code-worker agent prompt doesn't include project conventions
**Target**: Add project conventions to code-worker agent prompt

description: Parallel worker count should be increased — config change
sprintResults:
## Sprint 19 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | Worker | Wait Time |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|--------|----|
| #180 | Add feature A | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 0m |
| #182 | Add feature B | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 14m (queued) |
| #184 | Add feature C | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 28m (queued) |
| #186 | Add feature D | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 42m (queued) |
| #188 | Add feature E | 2 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 56m (queued) |
| #190 | Add feature F | 1 | ✅ Done | worker-1 | 68m (queued) |

**Velocity**: 11/11 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 50m (estimated 1h 00m)
**Workers**: 1 (configured) — all issues ran sequentially
**Queue Wait Time**: 208m total across 5 queued issues
**Root Cause**: `workers.parallel: 1` — all issues are independent, could run in parallel
**Recommendation**: Increase to `workers.parallel: 3` (issues don't share files)
**Estimated Duration with 3 workers**: ~40m
previousImprovements: Sprint 18 retro: Fixed agent prompt for test framework

description: Security scanning should be added to QG — skill addition
sprintResults:
## Sprint 15 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Security Issue Found Post-Merge |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #140 | Add file upload | 3 | ✅ Done | #141 | Path traversal vulnerability |
| #142 | Add user input form | 2 | ✅ Done | #143 | XSS vulnerability |
| #144 | Add SQL query builder | 2 | ✅ Done | #145 | SQL injection risk |
| #146 | Add URL redirect | 1 | ✅ Done | #147 | Open redirect vulnerability |
| #148 | Fix auth check | 2 | ✅ Done | #149 | OK |
| #150 | Add rate limiter | 2 | ✅ Done | #151 | OK |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 15m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no security scanning)
**Post-Merge Audit**: 4 security vulnerabilities found
**Root Cause**: Quality gate has no security scanning skill
**Target**: Add SAST/security scanning to quality gate skill set
**Impact**: 4 vulnerabilities shipped to main branch

description: Issue splitting process needed for oversized stories — process change
sprintResults:
## Sprint 21 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Lines Changed | Review Feasible? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #200 | Full database migration | 8 | ❌ Failed | #201 | 3,200 | No — too large |
| #202 | Complete API rewrite | 8 | ❌ Failed | #203 | 2,800 | No — too large |
| #204 | Fix small bug | 1 | ✅ Done | #205 | 12 | Yes |
| #206 | Update config | 1 | ✅ Done | #207 | 8 | Yes |
| #208 | Add test | 1 | ✅ Done | #209 | 35 | Yes |
| #210 | Fix typo | 1 | ✅ Done | #211 | 2 | Yes |

**Velocity**: 4/20 points completed (16 points failed)
**Duration**: 3h 00m (estimated 2h 00m)
**Root Cause**: Two 8-point issues are too large for single-PR delivery
**#200**: 3,200 lines changed — exceeds review capability
**#202**: 2,800 lines changed — exceeds review capability
**Target**: Add issue splitting step to sprint planning process
**Rule**: Issues >5 points must be split before entering sprint
